metadata.description:
Long after the extinction of the human race, the saga of Squarriors
begins. Divided by those species that wish to use their new unexplainable
intelligence to create a utopia, the Tin Kin, and their rival nemesis the
Maw, Squarriors is a the newest chapter of conflict in the earth's history.
metadata.name: Squarriors, Vol. 1: Spring
